data.text: @JP_Shahir Hai, @JP_Shahir. Kami akan kongsikan maklum balas anda dengan pihak berkenaan untuk semakan lanjut. Sementara itu, kami mencadangkan agar anda menyemak ketersediaan penerbangan melalui laman sesawang kami: https://t.co/4pFce9VX3U. -SR
@Syazwan_Raphiz >> membuat perbandingan dan mendapatkan tawaran terbaik untuk perjalanan anda. -SR

@Syazwan_Raphiz Kami memohon maaf atas kesulitan yang telah anda hadapi, @Syazwan_Raphiz. Sila maklum bahawa harga tiket sentiasa berubah bergantung pada promosi dan kekosongan tempat duduk. Kami mencadangkan anda agar cuba beberapa kombinasi tarikh yang berbeza bagi >>
@JP_Shahir Hai, @JP_Shahir. Boleh huraikan isu yang sedang anda hadapi untuk semakan lanjut? -SR
@farahhmalik We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused, @farahhmalik. Please be advised that we have responded via Direct Message. -SV

@shikingomez We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused, @shikingomez. Please be advised that we have responded via Direct Message. Kindly provide us with the requested details via Direct Message for our further checks. - TS
@MGMF150 Hello, @MGMF150. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. We have replied to your Direct Message. Please check your inbox. -RM

@Alpha_N_ Hello, @Alpha_N_. 

Thank you for contacting us. Please be informed that our social media support at present is only in English, Malay and Mandarin languages. >>

@AnkitNigam81 We apologise for the inconvenience caused, @AnkitNigam81. Kindly allow our Customer Relations team some time and they will respond to you at the soonest. In the meantime, we would appreciate your patience. -QY

@AnkitNigam81 Hi, @AnkitNigam81. Please be informed that the email team would be going through the e-mails on a first come first serve basis and experiencing a high volume of requests. Kindly allow them some time, once there is an update they will get in touch with you soon via e-mail. -YU
@AnkitNigam81 Hello, @AnkitNigam81. We apologise for the inconvenience caused. Please be informed that we have responded to your message in the 'Direct Message'. Kindly check your inbox. -MV

@smenon61 >> To view available flights and fares, we would recommend that you visit our website, click on the "Flights" tab, and try a combination of different dates to obtain your preferred fare. We hope that you will be able to find the fare that meets your expectation. -QY

@smenon61 We apologise for the inconvenience caused, @smenon61. Kindly be advised that our ticket fares are dynamically priced. This dynamic pricing is based on a few factors such as demand, promotion, and seasonal period. >>

@smenon61 Hi, @smenon61. Thank you for contacting us. Please be informed that no promo code is required for Matta 2022 promotion. We would recommend you follow our social media channel and our official website for upcoming updates regarding the promotion fare. -QZ
@PawanShokeen15 Hello, @PawanShokeen15. We apologise for the inconvenience caused. Please be informed that we have responded to your message in the 'Direct Message'. Kindly check your inbox. -QY

@RS_Belfast <<

A Customer Relations representative will investigate your case and get back to you to assist you accordingly. -KS

data.text:
@RS_Belfast Hello, @RS_Belfast. We are sorry to hear this. We would recommend that you fill in our Customer Feedback form via this link: https://t.co/Cu7RPLv5CK. You will receive an acknowledgment email with a case reference number once you successfully submit your complaint. 

>>

@RS_Belfast We are very sorry to hear this, and we understand your disappointment, @RS_Belfast. We will share your feedback with our department concerned for their further action and for the betterment of our services. Your continued support is highly appreciated. -KS
@RiteshK40248706 Thank you for contacting us, @RiteshK40248706. Please be informed that we have responded to your message in the 'Direct Message'. Kindly check your inbox. -KS

@AmanRajSaurabh1 Hello, @AmanRajSaurabh1. Thank you for contacting us. Please share the following details via Direct Message for our further checking:-

Passenger's Full Name (Last, Given):
E-ticket Number:
Booking Reference:
Email Address:

We look forward to hearing from you soon. -MG

@0xromy Hi, @0xromy. We are sorry to hear this. In that case, we suggest sending an email to [MHLbags@malaysiaairlines.com.my] for further assistance. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. -SV

@JPunjabi22 We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused, @JPunjabi22. Pleased to be informed that we suggest for you resume the conversation with the respective representative via the same email thread as our team will assist you accordingly with regard to your concern. -MV

@JPunjabi22 <<@JPunjabi22, Hence, we suggest for you resume the conversation with the respective representative via the same email thread as our team will assist you accordingly with regard to your concern. -MV
@JPunjabi22 We are sorry to hear this, @JPunjabi22. We sincerely apologise for this issue and we are sorry for this. Please understand this is never our goal to disappoint our customers. >>

@0xromy Thank you for getting back to us, @0xromy. Alternatively, you may contact our Mishandled Luggage Office (MLO) at +603-87772288 for immediate assistance.

Their office hours are stated below:
Monday to Sunday & Public Holidays: 07.00 am to 11.59 pm.

Hope this helps. -MV

@Duffi63Diane Hello, @Duffi63Diane. Thank you for contacting us. Please share the following details for our further checking:-

Passenger's Full Name (Last, Given): 
E-ticket Number:
Booking Reference: 
Email Address:

We look forward to hearing from you soon. -MV
@0xromy <<@0xromy,  by using the PIR number and passenger's last name. Then, click on the 'Baggage Tracer' tab. We apologise for the inconvenience caused. -MV

data.text: @0xromy Hello, @0xromy. Thank you for contacting us. Please be informed that any delayed, damaged, or lost baggage must be reported immediately upon arrival at the Mishandled Luggage Office, before leaving the airport. A Property Irregularity Report (PIR) number will be provided >>
